articles.author: Hayden E. Klein
articles.title: Dr Robert Gabbay on COVID-19 Vaccinations in the Diabetes Community - AJMC.com Managed Markets Network
articles.description: Robert A. Gabbay, MD, PhD, chief scientific and medical officer at the American Diabetes Association, discusses COVID-19 vaccinations among people with diabetes as they have been disproportionally affected by the pandemic.
articles.content: Efforts to address COVID-19 in the diabetes community are based, in part, on early recognition that these individuals would be disproportionately impacted, said Robert A. Gabbay, MD, PhD, chief scien… [+1257 chars]

source.name: American Council on Science and Health

articles.title: What COVID-19 Should Teach Us About Future Pandemics - American Council on Science and Health
articles.description: What went wrong during the COVID-19 pandemic? A team of public health researchers recently outlined some of the crucial policy mistakes we made and explained how we might avoid them in the future.
articles.content: After recognizing SARS-COV-2 as a global threat last spring, the pandemic response quickly devolved into an ideological war. Most people lined up on either side of an oversimplified debate and filter… [+7476 chars]
